all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
For after it hath filled the measure of its creation, it shall be crowned with glory, even with the presence of God the Father;
Doctrine and Covenants 88:19
Quote of the Day
"Through the matchless power of the Atonement of Jesus Christ, you can be made whole again."
Elder Scott D. Whiting | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
